name: Ext_R4B_Observation_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Observation.subject for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Observation.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Observation|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Who and/or what the observation is about
element.definition: The patient, or group of patients, location, or device this observation is about and into whose record the observation is placed. If the actual focus of the observation is different from the subject (or a sample of, part, or region of the subject), the `focus` element or the `code` itself specifies the actual focus of the observation.
element.comment: `Observation.subject` maps to R4 `Observation.subject`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Procedure)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Practitioner)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Substance)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
